transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, Satbiraj ji, Saloni bol rahi hun Indiamart se. Good afternoon.
Customer: Haan bolo.
Executive: Haan, haan main aapko call kar rahi thi wahi jo aapki head manager se maine baat karai thi. Isi ke liye karai thi ki usme agar kuch bhi possibility hoti to aapko karwa ke main de deti. But dikkat ye hai ki aapka uska renewal generate ho, renewal generate mein jab hum adjustment aapka dekhne ja rahe hain.
Executive: To usme amount itna hai hi nahi ki hum kisi service mein aapka wo transfer kar paye.
Executive: To yahi ek option hai ki jaisa aapka chal raha hai aap usi mein hi hum aapko guidance dete hain. Aap us hisab se regular week mein humse connect kar lijiye. Main aapko uske according guidance de dungi. Jaisa karwaya maine dusre clients ka. Kuch leads consume unhone kari hai, waise aapko bhi karwa dungi. But ek to thoda sa aapko time usme dena padega kyunki maine jab check kiya tha to usme timing ka thoda bahut fark hai aapke.
Customer: [inaudible] change kare din bhar baithe rahe waha ke baithe rahe uska kya matlab hai bhejne ka din bhar baithe rahe.
Executive: Aap phone se check kar lo. Phone se aap zaruri nahi hai ki aap system pe raho. Main aapko ek site bata dungi. To aap uske through waha pe phone pe bhi aap usme check kar sakte ho aur wo auto refresh wala jo filter hai wo waha pe bhi apply kar sakte ho phone mein hi chala karke.
Executive: Kyunki iska koi solution hai nahi hamare paas agar hota to wo amount mein main khud hi adjust kara deti. Maine aapko khud hi option diya tha. Maine aapko ye bataya tha ki main aapko amount nikal kar ke bataungi agar hua to karwa dungi.
Customer: [inaudible] solution de do mere ko is cheez ka aap.
Executive: Solution sir usme bhi kuch aisa solution nahi hai. Baat ye hai ki usme duration [unintelligible].
Customer: Solution agar mere ko aap solution ye solution to aap bata rahe ho na aap hi log. Solution agar aapne kuch 6 mahine pehle bataya hota na to ho gaye hote wo bhi mera. Ye to aap logo ko karwane ki khani hai aap logo ko. Ab aap is baat ko bata rahe ho mere ko.
Executive: Aisa nahi hai sir, aisa nahi hai. Main aapko bataun. Koi bhi agar service aap lete ho star ki. Jab main aapko main jab main recharge karane baad me jaise aapko day one se bol raha hu mere se ye problem aa rahi hai tab bhi aap ye baat bata sakte the mere ko.
Executive: Aapne day one se bola hoga. Bilkul baat sahi hai. Lekin agar koi bhi package live hota hai chahe wo aapka basic package ho chahe premium package ho live hone ke at least teen se char mahine aapko use karke hi tabhi samajh aa pata hai. System mein agar hum dalte bhi hai na team ko ye cheez to unka concern khud yahi reply aata hai ki aapka abhi service live hua hai.
Executive: To is wajah se aapko shuru mein ho sakta hai nahi bataya gaya hoga ye. Starting ke teen se char mahine ki baat kar rahi hun. Uske baad agar nahi aapko inform kara gaya hai to wo aapka account manager jo hai wo us cheez ke liye waha pe reliable hota hai responsible hota hai ki aapko wo kis according wo guidance dega. Wo dikkat waha se aati hai.
Customer: [inaudible] ke baad mein aap logo ne apne hath hataaye hath hataaye mein aap logo ko kuch nahi bas.
Executive: Aisa to nahi hai sir ki service aapki band hui hai. Service to aapki to chal rahi hai. [inaudible] service to kya karu main kabhi thodi service isko main.
Customer: [inaudible] chalti rahegi khatam ho jayega time paid hua uska.
Executive: Aisa to sir nahi hai na ki hum lead yaha pe [inaudible] se generate nahi ho rahi hai.
Customer: [inaudible] lagne ke baad me koi result nahi nikal raha kya matlab uska generate ka tumhara uska. Kya matlab dene se baat karane ka kya kya kya matlab hai.
Executive: Competition, competition bataiye hum kya kar sakte hain bataiye competition to aapke offline market mein.
Customer: Ye aapne bataya tha ki competition hoga is tarike se hoga ye bataya tha kya aapne mere ko.
Executive: Competition to sir dikha sakte hain aapko. Aapko ye nahi pata aapko mil jayega wo bhi mil jayega aapne bade bade sapne dikhaye the mere ko. Ye competition wali baatein nahi ki thi aap logo ne abhi tak baat kar rahe ho aap log.
Executive: Competition aapko dikhaya nahi hoga. Star aur leader to tabhi dikhate hain jab waha pe aapko jitne star chala rahe hain leader chala rahe hain.
Customer: Aap logo ne sirf sapne dikhaye bade bade aur kuch nahi dikhaya uske alava.
Executive: Main dekhiye wo cheez samajhti hun ki aapko unhone kuch alag se cheeze aur batai wo cheez main manti hun.
Customer: [inaudible] baat karne usko waste karne se matlab to hai nahi kuch cheez ka.
Executive: Main bas main dekhiye bas ye bol rahi hun ki aap
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough buyleads.

- Wants a solution for the issue.

- Expresses dissatisfaction with the service.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the limitations of adjustments.

- Suggested using the mobile app for convenience.

- Offered guidance and support for lead generation.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, support, guidance
